name: Michael A Broderick
title: Trimmer
coverLetter:
Hello, 


My name is Michael and I saw your ad on Craigslist for the bud trimmer positions. I have been a longtime marijuana smoker, and have recently gotten into home-growing, trimming, curing, and smoking my own product. However, it's only been in small doses so far, and in my free time, but think I'd like to make a career out of the marijuana industry. I took the test about a week ago, I passed with a 28/30 score. I am waiting for approval from the OLCC, but my certification is #8061279. I would love to be apart of your business, have attached my resume, and look forward to hopefully hearing back from you. 


Thank you,

Michael Broderick
experience:

Prep cook/dishwasher May 2017-Present


Local Harvest Eatery & Pub

Kitchen and Server March 2016-April 2017
